about.heading: ABOUT US
about.text:
Saffron – modern Indian cuisine at the crossroads of authenticity and contemporary flair, where you can enjoy delicious curries, samosas, seafood dishes, and various thalis. Dishes are prepared with the level of spiciness you prefer. For guests who want it "just like in India," we offer chili and fresh green hot peppers. The restaurant features a signature presentation and plating style, with tableware brought from India and Spain.

The concept is designed for everyone who has ever visited—or dreamed of visiting—places beyond the borders of Russia!

Our brand chef and head chef are Indian professionals who have worked for many years in restaurants in London and Dubai.

The entire team speaks Hindi, English, and Russian.

We’ll help you choose a dish to your taste and are always happy to listen to your preferences.
